title: language identification
short_text: mobile spoken LID using machine learning
full_text: As part of my final project of my undergrad I led a team of 6 to complete a project working with the State Emergency Service here in Tasmania. The aim of the project was to create a mobile application to identify spoken language using machine learning, to aid non English-speaking crash site victims. </br></br>This was implemented using Flutter, and Python for the ML using TensorFlow. I gained a lot of experience working with tensorflow, Flutter development, and working in a team on this project, it was a lot of fun!
